mapper.insert: /* SaleDtlChannelMapper.getSaleDtlChannelSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_SALE_REPORT_MOMS ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, REQ_DATE, REQ_TIME, REPORT_TYPE, FROM_SALE_DATE, TO_SALE_DATE, PROC_FG, PROC_MSG, PROC_DT, FILE_NAME, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_OPTION, PROD_CD, PROD_NM, STORE_HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD_LIST, PROD_HQ_BRAND_CD, PROD_CD_LIST, MOMS_TEAM, MOMS_AC_SHOP, MOMS_AREA_FG, MOMS_COMMERCIAL, MOMS_SHOP_TYPE, MOMS_STORE_MANAGE_TYPE, BRANCH_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, '0000000', #{reqDate}, #{reqTime}, '01', #{dataCreateMonth}||'01', #{dataCreateMonth}||#{dataCreateMonthLastDate}, '0', '', '', '', #{prodClassCd}, #{prodOption}, #{prodCd}, #{prodNm}, #{storeHqBrandCd}, #{storeCds:CLOB}, #{prodHqBrandCd}, #{prodCds:CLOB}, #{momsTeam}, #{momsAcShop}, #{momsAreaFg}, #{momsCommercial}, #{momsShopType}, #{momsStoreManageType}, #{branchCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
